results.content:
What's good about this course: You learn loads of different coding in HTML and CSS. You get a basic course with Javascript/Jquery and Bootstrap, which will help you get to know how these work. Santosh thoroughly explains much of everything in great detail so you'll understand it.
What's disappointing about this course: Many things are over-explained, that this course feels like "driving down the highway in a golf cart". No "putting everything together" later in this course so that you can build a few webpages using everything you learned all together. The PHP section (which includes MySQL) is too short other than how to install it and check that it works.
results.content_html:

What's disappointing about this course: Many things are over-explained, that this course feels like "driving down the highway in a golf cart". No "putting everything together" later in this course so that you can build a few webpages using everything you learned all together. The PHP section (which includes MySQL) is too short other than how to install it and check that it works.

results.content:
This course will dive you into depth of HTML CSS. Even though I have learned it from other sources but i find numerous tags which were new to me and very handy.
Video quality is very good . I think this course will work for beginners as well as intermediate learners to dive them inside web designing.
